name: Sangoku Rensenki: Otome no Heihou! Omoide Gaeshi - CS Edition
name_original: Sangoku Rensenki: Otome no Heihou! Omoide Gaeshi - CS Edition
description:
Sangoku Rensenki: Otome no Heihou! Omoide Gaeshi - CS Edition is an adventure game developed by prototype. It came out on 04-02-2016. It was published by PROTOTYPE.
You can play Sangoku Rensenki: Otome no Heihou! Omoide Gaeshi - CS Edition on PSP and PS Vita.
